django.contrib.messages.storage.fallback
========================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.messages.storage.fallback


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.messages.storage.fallback.FallbackStorage


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: FallbackStorage(*args, **kwargs)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.messages.storage.base.BaseStorage`


   Try to store all messages in the first backend. Store any unstored
   messages in each subsequent backend.


   .. py:attribute:: storage_classes


   .. py:attribute:: storages
